website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for small to mid-level projects around the house and for users who are looking for a compact and affordable kit, but it has limitations compared to standard power tools.
pros: An innovative concept that's like six power tools in one, thanks to the Matrix power unit's Quick Connect system and attachments that include drill, sander, jigsaw, oscillating tool, router, and impact driver
cons: Reports of the 20-volt lithium ion battery not living up to its advertised long life

customer_reviews.title: Great house warming gift
customer_reviews.text: I've owned and used the Craftsman 'Bolt-On' series for years, that is until my local SEARS closed and they stopped selling the tools. I am by no means a professional, I use the tools for projects and air pump for topping off my bike tires and most recently to get one of my car tires inflated enough so the 'low pressure' idiot light would turn off. Much to my surprise STANLEY-BLACK + DECKER 'Matrix' bolt-ons work with my Craftsman handle and I've since picked up a trim saw. So, when my son bought his home, 'BINGO' I got him the Matrix 6 Tool Combo kit. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Velobill

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Ordered in November 2017. Using it for maybe the third or fourth time (all of which were quick using the screwdriver or drill) today. Today I was using a cutting attachment. It smelled like it was burning while using it. When I changed the attachment back to the drill attachment a screw fell out of the motor part. Not very well made for the price. I should get more than 4 uses out of it for a few hundred bucks.
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set for quick jobs!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set I’ve purchased. My husband has owned his for 2 years and has used the heck out of it. We had to replace his jigsaw attachment once, as it did not live through cutting metal, as the gears are plastic... but I’m not upset or shocked by that at all, just a warning. For small quick jobs, this is a great set and saves you from having to pull out big tools. This second set was purchased for our teenage son so he stops stealing my husbands! The third set for my elderly mother who can handle large tools and doesn’t want to store them in her small home, she loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Swattsx

customer_reviews.title: Great for light duty home improvement projects
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly like described, the kit is great for people who need light duty tools that are easily portable. Also good for basic home repair and improvement jobs. Basically if you are the kind of person who knows how to use these tools and when to use them but doesn't need them often enough to justify the cost of heavier duty versions or have the space to store 1 of every tool you might need, then this kit is great!
customer_reviews.author: Rashao

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍  tool. B&D did it again!
customer_reviews.text: For the weekend warriors, get it. It appears to be a GREAT home tool. Read all the reviews but remember what your getting. This will be great for home repairs and hobbies. The best part is the easy to use attachments. With a pistol grip and variable speed trigger it makes using the accessories easy and fun. I would always recommend buying extra batteries and the other attachments. I will be buying the plug 🔌 in version for bigger jobs ( super affordable) .
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Schultz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile product
customer_reviews.text: I have a small space and needed a variety of tools. This is prefect. It comes with all this basics and I can add more.attachments as need, including a plug-in handle/power supply (instead of using batteries). I use this for small home DIY projects and repairs as well as craft projects. I don't know how it would hold up to daily wear from a heavy user but it seems very sturdy and will made. For my needs it's just right. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Madee Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good tool kit for jobs around the house.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is good for hobbies and small jobs. I've used all the tools and they work fine. Had this for over a year and still going strong. It has saved me hours by not having to drag power cords around. I use the hammer drill attachment the most. The jig saw attachment works great for drywall work. I even use the batteries in my B&D weed wipper. It's great having batteries that work on all my hand held tools.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: First time home buyer approved
customer_reviews.text: This kit is so versatile! I definitely recommend it to a first time home owner who has some small jobs to do around the house. I bought the circular saw attachment for it too but I haven't had a chance to use it yet. The drill is great, the jigsaw works decently and I love the sander. I haven't had a chance to use the router or dremel so I can't comment on those but honestly I don't know what you use those for but I'm glad I have them anyway. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brando

customer_reviews.title: Great set for lighter duty, occassional use around the house
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the opportunity to use the drill and jigsaw attachments. The jigsaw worked great on 1/2 inch plywood and the drill was fine for drilling pilot holes and driving screws through multiple pieces of sandwiched plywood. I don't look at this set as an everyday use set but for a homeowner that occasionally need multiple tools for small projects it fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: versatility in a box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the Craftsman tool. I still had some of the attachments after the main body gave up. They are built better that the B&D but never the less its a good bang for the buck. Don't know what to expect as far as life goes but is a great way to save storage space for all the tools they represent. If your a serious craftsmen you may want to invest in individual tools.
customer_reviews.author: walter j teper

customer_reviews.title: Great product, buy a replacement battery with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great product thus far. My only complaint is the severely lacking battery life. I can only use my tools for about 20 minutes before it requires a recharge. Highly recommend buying a replacement battery along with the purchase of this set.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbilina

customer_reviews.title: Not what it use to be.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I had the first combo (Firestorm), built well, but the power was for the toys of a 5 year old, never was able to complete a project, but this one is all it should be. I would buy it again, if I had too............
customer_reviews.author: Dorman Brandon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: VERY HANDY
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THAT ALL THE TOOLS ARE IN ONE CARRY CASE. WISH I HAD CAUGHT THE SELL. BUT STILL A GOOD DEAL, BATTERY LAST A LONG TIME, BUILT A GATE AND USED ALL OF THE TOOLS AND BATTERY STILL HAD LOTS OF JUICE LEFT, AMAZING , BOUGHT AIR ATTACHMENT LOVE IT, PRICE NOW WOULD MAKE A WONDERFUL CHRISTMAS GIFT, GETTING 2 MORE FOR OUR BOYS LOVE LOVE LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: lab mom

customer_reviews.title: Great set for occasional home use
customer_reviews.text: Great set for occasional home use, but you will want to have all existing attachments. Tip: if you want to buy something like trim saw attachment or reciprocating saw, look at price of Craftsman Bolt On attachments - they usually cheaper. Don't expect that kit charger is any good - buy quick charger right from the start. Also consider buying Matrix bag - it's ultra convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Andy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: This is a great system if you only have an occasional need for a reciprocal saw, circular saw, etc. Takes up a lot less space than having all of those tools individually and makes it easy to take anywhere. I had the previous version of this system that had NiCad batteries. Got tired of replacing the batteries and upgraded to the new version with the lithium ion batteries. The new system is designed even better than the original version.
customer_reviews.author: JABrwoky13

customer_reviews.title: A workshop of power tools on a shelf in a closet.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t completed a full project with this yet so I don’t think I can give a thorough review. But I rent an apartment with limited storage. I love this because it gives me a workshop in a small box. I’ve used most of the attachments at least once for odd jobs, and I’ve appreciated it for all of them. And there are more attachments available! I’m working on the plans for a big job - building a custom bed - so I will update with how it stood up then.
customer_reviews.author: markmagoo

customer_reviews.title: Motor can't cut the mustard with all attachments.
customer_reviews.text: Only four stars simply because the motor unit its self simply isn't strong enough to handle the load of all the available attachments. Really I've only had an issue with the sawzaw attachment. The motor began smoking after just a minute of use but as a sander, drill, impact driver, router, and cutter it's great! The jigsaw attachment is still a bit hard on it but it seems to still work alright.
customer_reviews.author: JimBo

customer_reviews.title: Greatest power tool set for a DIY tool guy!
customer_reviews.text: I added the trim saw attachment as well and purchased an 18" Cargo tool bag Item# 2463359 from Menards. I wish they also made a circular saw attachment, because the trim saw isn't big enough to cut through a standard 2x4 on one pass, but you can't have it all I guess. Plus the trim saw itself drains the battery pretty fast. Home Depot has a basic, entry router bit set for $18 PRO-SERIES Router Bit Set (12-Piece) Model # PS07426 Internet #204339014
customer_reviews.author: H. Csuri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, carry and store.  Everything I need in one box.
customer_reviews.text: I am a real estate Investor and while I call in the big guns for the big stuff, this has saved me so much $$$ When Small things need to be fixed (These may work on big projects, too, but I haven't tried) I got more attachments, and I can keep it all in my trunk. I'm a woman, who is finicky about her manicure, and I have to say, these tools are so easy to use. This is so nice to have absolutely everything I need all in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Amazon is not a autroized distributor b+d won't honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: Had product for a while now and only used once the motor is going out and Amazon and black and Decker both refuse to honer warranty go figure
customer_reviews.author: Carmela Rice

customer_reviews.title: Dead after using for the 3rd time ( lasted 2 weeks)
customer_reviews.text: Updated review....I finally decided to open the matrix drill apart to find out wth is going...3 weeks old drill. Thanks to a YouTube video I found out that my drill was missing 2 important screws that held the motor in place to the black mount...so my motor has been trying to spin inside and eventually the electrical contacts came off thus shutting down motor....I dont even know how to deal with Amazon and Black and Decker on this...insane!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fabio F

customer_reviews.title: Better than you think
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. Most cases are so flimsy and cant be used long for me. The latches are metal and the case is a very good hard plastic. Inside plastic holding the tools are perfect fits. Everything came perfectly. Have no issues at all and if i need more id buy again. Proce is good to for the quailty.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for general use
customer_reviews.text: If you are just looking for general use, this is the set for you. If you are building a house, look elsewhere. The attachments change easily. The batteries are interchangeable with the rest of the B&D yard tools. The circular saw blade attachment works, but only on thin jobs. Learned this trimming a door that was sticking on the floor. Absolutely no complaints with it. Storage case works great. Keeps things organized and no need to have 6 power tools laying around.
customer_reviews.author: Average American Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Black and Decker customer service is horrible. It's been about a month and I still ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with router bit or jig saw blades. Black and Decker customer service is horrible. It's been about a month and I still cant use this tool. I don't know why they don't make the replacement parts easier to find.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small jobs around the house
customer_reviews.text: Used the drill today for the first time since it arrived. Excellent for small jobs around the house. I also bought the hand saw attachment and had no problems cutting boards. I would recommend a second battery though. I cut through a few boards and the battery died on me. I had a second battery charged and attached it and kept on working. For a larger job though, I'm fixing to order the corded matrix electric drill. So far all the attachments work great. Other than the battery running low on me, the attachments did their job. I highly recommend this product for around the home DYI jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: NOT VERY GOOD QUALITY - VERY SHORT LIFE
customer_reviews.text: Not a complete bad deal taking into account the price, but this set is not of a very good quality. O bought it a few months ago, used it very few times to put some frames in the wall (let's say, 3 times), and the Drill/Driver Attachment now oscilates and it's not reliable. Seems like the drill loosened. I didn't expect that to happen in a Black & Decker product, used to think they were of a higher quality. Also, the battery doesn't last too long.
customer_reviews.author: Santiva

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't seem like everything fits comfortably inside with space for the trim ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have to take the star off for is the case. It doesn't seem like everything fits comfortably inside with space for the trim saw. If it was slightly deeper it'd be nice. That aside, the body and battery are awesome and the sound level is comfortable to use without any ear protection. There is no points to take off there and if possible I'd have gone 4.5/5. Price to product value is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Talerico

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad i found this. I already had a black and decker drill with changeable flashlight but could never find other interchangeable pieces. This really came in handy and worked well on my projects. Im ordering the circular saw attachment next.
customer_reviews.author: kalidascope

customer_reviews.title: Great for DIYers!
customer_reviews.text: Construction and carpentry professionals might want to look elsewhere for more specialized tools, but as a home DIYer, there is not a better quality set of tools that comes any cheaper than this. I am constantly looking forward to my next project so I can use these tools. My only suggestion is to buy an extra battery right now. For the drill attachment the battery does not drain too quickly, but the router and trim saw drain it fairly fast and it takes the better part of 2-3 hours to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: CKirk

customer_reviews.title: For DIY projects this little kit has been extremely handy ...
customer_reviews.text: For DIY projects this little kit has been extremely handy. Being able to just change out the heads has been so much of a space saver and time saver we can just use it for most of the small at home projects. We also bought the trim saw attachment which completed the set for most wood working needs that we had. Beats having thousands in tool that take up so much space on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Other issues being the overheating issue but it seems like Black & Decker has released a newer version couple ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this product for a year now. He hasn't had any major issue except with the jigsaw attachment. It would seem that the drill is not strong enough. Other issues being the overheating issue but it seems like Black & Decker has released a newer version couple of months after we bought this one. Most of the complaints were about heating up. Wish they would mention of any schedule for their upgrades to current models.
customer_reviews.author: arwa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for around the house.
customer_reviews.text: The Black & Decker Matrix 6 Tool kit is very useful. The drill/screw driver works very well and has adjustable torque. The attachments are easy to change and everything fits well in the case. I have used the oscillating tool frequently for fine cuts on small items, and the jigsaw for achieving circular cuts in wood. I can see many more uses for this product in the future. The battery is easy to remove and install and charges in a good amount of time. Great purchase for around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this kit
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this kit. Extremely versatile, and it all fits in a carrying case. Epic win. Recommend buying extra batteries though - When the battery goes low, it doesn't slow down, it shuts off...... Nothing worse than dead batteries in the middle of a job. The battery does have great life though. NOTE: You might also want to pick up the Matrix Air Compressor Pump that goes on this drill as well. SUPER convenient.... That way you don't have to drag out the air compressor when you've got a low tire on a lawn mower or bike or something small.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Would give it 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tool set for a while now and have used everything and have had no problems at all. They have been just awesome and I consider the kit as one of my best purchases off Amazon. I could not be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Lou

customer_reviews.title: versatile product
customer_reviews.text: B&D cordless drill kit has multiple functions, and a great 20v lithium battery that is interchangeable with other B&D products (hedge trimmer, blower, etc.) Great all-around products that work well together.
customer_reviews.author: TribalDancer2

customer_reviews.title: Be careful you get the right model
customer_reviews.text: Cannot comment on pictured product as it is not what I received. I believe i likely got an older model which I am still debating on returning. I hope to update this review whether or not i end up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Foolery

customer_reviews.title: Great set for small projects.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set to keep around the house for little projects. It is more powerful than many other comparable sets and I like that you can buy additional attachments. My only concern is what I will do if the main body ever goes out. I would hate to have to rebuy the entire set. I definitely do need more powerful tools for my outside projects, however.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Great concept , got all 6 attachments in one set . The drill is very usefully but half of the attachments are no so much. The motor is lack of the power and the battery die fast. The handle I have that the switch keep stuck for me.......
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Best tool for around the house projects!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few months now and so far is the best purchase I’ve made since buying my home!!!! Perfect for around the house needs, I’ve already repaired my ceiling, built a fence with a gate, and plan on installing a railing on my cement stairs out back. I bought two extra batteries and the saws all attachment and some extra blades and I’m sure that’s all I’ll ever need with this amazing tool, though I have all the attachments on my wish list! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Summer M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for DIY Projects
customer_reviews.text: 1 Year Review I used the Matrix for about a year now and I have to say that if something were to happen to it, I'd have to replace it. It is one of the most versatile tools that I have in my garage. From from drilling to cutting to sanding, it can tackle just about every DIY project out there that only requires basics. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar A.

customer_reviews.title: Great little bundle package for around the house jobs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these at a killer price on the amazon prime day. Love the versatility and quick swap out. These aren't contractor grade tools so don't expect them to be but they can more than handle themselves on any around the house job. If you're looking to get a variety of tools in a convenient bundle, then you can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: "Honey-Do" List Done
customer_reviews.text: This has served well in limited use. It certainly isn't designed for professional, daily, or any type of heavy-duty function, but it excels as a toolkit for the occasional home handyman. I enjoy the flexibility of the various tools, and it is more than adequate for handling odd jobs around the house and the occasional home improvement or construction project. If it eventually dies, wears out, or breaks, I'd happily buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C

customer_reviews.title: Missing router bit
customer_reviews.text: Kind of angry right now. Bought this for my husband and router didn’t come with the router bit. Now to try to find one. We bought this specifically because it came with a router. So upset.
customer_reviews.author: SassyGerl

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of tools included
customer_reviews.text: Great amount of tools included...it's not a construction grade tool, it probably wouldn't last. It's light enough for her to use it and not get tired. For the price, I'm not going to complain. My level of "work" around the house is pretty light, which makes this perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Women approved
customer_reviews.text: Great for the crafting women who want to have their own tools....did use online videos to figure out the router attachment setup since the instructions included didn't work as easy as it says it would. But I got it figured out and love my new tools. Highly recommend for the independent women
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for a first time home buyer.
customer_reviews.text: This tool set is so awesome! The price point is amazing for what you get. I tossed the case and got a sturdy carrying bag, but the tools are great. Just last night I used the drill, sander, and saw to get a project done in a matter of 30 mins. The ease of use is amazing. I am a new homeowner and the tools meet my needs. I did buy the optional saw attachment which is helpful and fairly reasonably priced. I am excited to tackle many projects with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Being The Change

customer_reviews.title: Combo kit
customer_reviews.text: Love it. great kit. works as advertised and have had no problems with any of the components. In fact even purchased the circular saw and recip saw attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy all kit, only some part works fine
customer_reviews.text: Jigsaw, Driver, Sander works great. Oscillating tool failed to cutting anything due to poor power, but a power one if you do need it. And never buy the saw attachment, it is small, can do 1" plank. Jigsaw works much better. It you do need a saw to deal planks, buy a big one, this can only deal 1'.
customer_reviews.author: W. Chien

customer_reviews.title: Great multi tool set
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up when it was the deal of the day. We needed an extra drill and this was a great option. I love all the attachments for it. I built a cornhole set and was able to use a few of the attachments. They're easy to take on and off and there's enough variety that you can eliminate a few extra tools if you aren't needing it for every day use. I just wish it came with an extra battery, using the jig saw sucked the battery pretty quick so I almost didn't get the job done before it died.
customer_reviews.author: C. Spranger

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the money you get a lot of different options in this little box
customer_reviews.text: I think I would have given it 5 Stars if it came with a few more accessory bits and Blades and such. But it didn't just one of this and one of that. The kurian box is very cheaply made and is difficult to latch closed the internal plastic tool holders is made of nothing more than cheap plastic like you'd get plants in from a garden store. I've yet to put it too real remodeling work when I do I'll write an additional review.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for a beginning homeowner or someone just getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this set all around my house and it's been a beast. Perfect set for a beginning homeowner or someone just getting into getting their own tools. You'll find it covers so many bases. Thought I might regret this purchase from being used to having individual tools as opposed to this all in one approach but I'm loving em. Just got done with multiple house projects using this tool before I wrote this review. Worth a shot if you're considering it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent self contained kit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent self contained kit, has just about everything one would need to get things done for most jobs. Long battery life which eliminates the constant charging & interruptions when you don’t have an extra battery on hand.
customer_reviews.author: DMBoats

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Extremely convenient kit for smaller house or outdoor projects. Very easy to use and switch between attachments. I've used the drill and sander attachments the most to build outdoor tables and garden trellis's but it's worked perfectly. Highly recommend! I purchased the small skil-saw attachment separately which is nice but only cuts around 1 3/8 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Seems alright... but
customer_reviews.text: Arrived late, also the box was broken, probably from an impact during shipping. Hopefully this won't affect the motor when used.
customer_reviews.author: evilRoldy

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 because the router attachment is useless. I got a great deal on this and ...
customer_reviews.text: 4/5 because the router attachment is useless. I got a great deal on this and I already have a decent router. The rest of the attachments are quality and very easy to switch out. It is very nice because this is a compact setup. This would be great for someone with little to no tools. If you want to get your foot into woodworking, buy this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Michael Norman

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor design
customer_reviews.text: The portion of the drill where the components connect to breaks down over time dislodging the attachments while in use. Have remove, reattach, wiggle, etc... to get the attachments to function. Great idea, poor design.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Get the wired drill too
customer_reviews.text: I bought the combo case, and also the wired version of the Matrix drill. I figured if I invested in the combo, I might as well choose an option that can rely on house power too. so now I have 2 matrix wireless drills and one wired powered one. I read some reviews about poor battery reliability, but will test this out. I will report another review after I have used it a bit. I also purchased the circular saw attachment.
customer_reviews.author: sc customer 1

customer_reviews.title: I love these drills
customer_reviews.text: I had a black n Decker like this about 15 years ago. This 1 has a lot more to it and it is great. I just put some cat doors on scream doors for a friend with ease. I aired up a car tire the day after I got it. (I ordered an extra piece to put on it).
customer_reviews.author: Brent K

customer_reviews.title: Give me things to cut and drill
customer_reviews.text: This set is so nice! I got it for a really good price and even got the circular saw accessory (craftsman). It made me inspired to do those DIY projects you see on pinterest. I used them on a project for converting my ottomans into storage ottomans and putting more cushioning in them. I have two large ottomans that I can push together to make into a twin xl "bed". Can't wait for more things to use this kit on.
customer_reviews.author: sew happy!

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for handy housework
customer_reviews.text: Great product I love that I can change the drill heads out I have so many uses for this! Box is good too. Some of the parts are a little weak so it's not meant for real construction or anything but for a handy housework and everything it is amazing definitely a buy! FOR HANDY HOUSE WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Solo

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the Do-it-yourself-er
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! I have used almost all of the attachments around the house. The attachments are easy to change and all work well. Great job to B&D on this one. Note: It doesn't come with router bits, but does come with reciprocating saw and jig saw blades and sanding pad and rotary saw blade. Works as advertised. Perfect for this handy man. Can I say that I love the Matrix system. Keep in mind that you can also purchase the craftsman "bolt on" series attachments and they work well too.
customer_reviews.author: Keith & Allison

customer_reviews.title: Burnt the drill on a 2x4.
customer_reviews.text: Nice system...but not robust. The main component the drill motor fried itself while using the saber saw attachment and cutting thru a 2x4. Seriously??? Luckily I had also purchased the corded drill so it's not a $300 loss, but to go cordless again would cost another $70 investment. You'd think that B&D would've built a more beefy motor to fit this system or at least make an uograded drill option.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool Set
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Matrix tool set. All of the different attachments work very well and I love using them. I have used this set several times around other people and the always think it is amazing. It is a very high quality set and works great for people like me who like building an occasional project but don't want to go out and buy a ton of really expensive power tools. I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ricks Munn

customer_reviews.title: it is good to have an option if I decide to do ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this tool in black friday deal. As a new homeowner, it is really worth having all these tools handy in home. Though I havent used all the attachments that comes with it, it is good to have an option if I decide to do any DIY project :). Battery hold good juice. I was able to cut loads of plywood and many drills before it died. This set only comes with phillips and flathead bit, so you will have to buy all other bits and drill heads. You can get those cheap at Lowes or home depot.
customer_reviews.author: AddyB

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream! I've made a couple things with it using the saw attachment. The battery has held up pretty good, and hasn't lost any power during a project.
customer_reviews.author: Loganwil2

customer_reviews.title: What every home needs
customer_reviews.text: If you are a first time home buyer or plan to live in your rental for more than a year, get this set! It has just about everything you will need! Also, sanding pads, cutting blades are very easy to find at Lowe's or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: tlfuller

customer_reviews.title: Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it!!!!! My son-in-law wants one now!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get a Second Battery
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I decided to purchase this set along with a few individual attachments that weren't included. It's for small jobs around the house. Especially ones where you need to use multiple tools one after another. Only downside is battery life. Best to get a spare & swap them around.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit For DYI Home Owner
customer_reviews.text: Initial unboxing was great. Case is very legit. Metal clips, sturdy plastic case, more than enough to protect the equipment for storage. All features worked upon initial testing. Very excited to see this kit in action. Much better than having 8 different tools to do the same tasks. Especially for a FYI home owner. Any flaws in the product will come later if it ever occurs. For now, highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for myself and I must say "I LOVE IT"! Battery last a long time but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and I must say "I LOVE IT"! Battery last a long time but I did buy an extra one. There is a tool for everything and I also added the circular saw. I think it works great.
customer_reviews.author: EMMA JB

customer_reviews.title: Good unit & attachments - beware of sharp edge
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, with useful attachments. Would be nice if it had a light as most of this type of unit do, now. Echo other reviewer's caution about a sharp edge near the trigger, especially cautious when adjusting clutch. No wounds yet, but I see the potential - will need to get a file or sand paper & smooth it down.
customer_reviews.author: CharBoy

customer_reviews.title: Great design to keep things compact
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful enough for industrial use but for the basic DIY-er, this is a great package. The ability to swap out heads has been awesome and keeps my tool bag light and compact and has made projects much faster and streamlined.
customer_reviews.author: John Eung Soo Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good even for just the impact driver and drill
customer_reviews.text: Kit has been great. I mainly needed it for the impact driver and a stronger drill. Just with those two attachments I think it's well worth it. The other attachments work as expected but not as well as stand alone product. Even so for occasional light used the saw and sander have done ok.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all in one!
customer_reviews.text: This thing came in and I used all the tools except the router (no bits). They all work well! I just suggest getting more batteries becuase If you use it as much as I do you are going to run out of battery quick
customer_reviews.author: Emad

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner tool kit.
customer_reviews.text: Real handy toot kit in a small casing. I used this to modify a dresser and just what I wanted. Price was good and so far no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Hkm

customer_reviews.title: Do It Yourself
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. When it was on a daily special, I ordered it. As a seventy year old woman, I need a set of tools that I could operate myself. This set is it. I've used the sander and the screw driver. Both of them are easy to handle. As jobs come up, I plan to use all the tools and save myself the handyman bills.
customer_reviews.author: nancy worth davis

customer_reviews.title: This is what handymen and hobbyists dream of
customer_reviews.text: This is what handymen and hobbyists dream of! Couldn't ask for a more convenient and "handy" power tool set.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: A good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the performance to date, use them every day nearly.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love how easy it is to change ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love how easy it is to change the heads and as a new homeowner, this drill has came in very handy! The one thing that is missing is the light at the tip of the drill, but I haven't run into any situations where a light on the drill would be vital to the success of the project.
customer_reviews.author: JV Zamora

customer_reviews.title: This is my fav purchase in a very long time and if you are a basic diy'er than this is great for you
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it but to test out the attachments which all work very well so far. This is my fav purchase in a very long time and if you are a basic diy'er than this is great for you. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for around the house and great quality at a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, am very happy with rhe versatility! Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Dareck

customer_reviews.title: Great for DIYer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic to have, all attachments are easy to change between and the battery life is amazing. Easy to bring anywhere and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: like that its in own case clean and neat very happy ty.
customer_reviews.author: royce andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, handy to have everything at hand
customer_reviews.text: Everything contained in one kit. You are not going to build a house with this kit but you will be able to do pretty much anything around the house with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Good but not so good
customer_reviews.text: So far my other half loves this product! He asked me to look for an oscillating saw cus his burned up . I saw this deal and decided to take a chance! We've only had this a week maybe so can't rate battery life of anything else ! This would be good just doing little things around the house but not with impact tool. Mine burnt up 2 weeks after or longer
customer_reviews.author: patty crippen

customer_reviews.title: But the impact and drill drivers are great. Impact driver has plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the impact driver and drill driver really. The others were just a bonus. Go slow with the jigsaw, obviously its not as powerful as a 120v one, but did the job. It uses t shank blades and they secure very well. Haven't used the router attachment, wonder how powerful it will be. But the impact and drill drivers are great. Impact driver has plenty of power, all that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even work for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this February 27,2020 and it just stopped working last night. Not even three months old and I've only used it about 15 times.
customer_reviews.author: Dustie C.

customer_reviews.title: Bunk batteries in my set
customer_reviews.text: The tools work great with my wife's weed eater battery the two batteries that came with my tool didn't even work they don't charge but the one for the weedeater matches right in
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Waltz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter for her wood working projects. She loves it and uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great cost-effective set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, cost effective set of tools for a person looking to get the basics without buying the each one individually. All the attachments seem to work well. The only critique I have is that the router attachment in a little under powered. It tends to drag and not be smooth so it requires multiple passes. Over-all I definitely recommend it for those casual users just starting their tool collection.
customer_reviews.author: Will Gangi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Recipient loves it. Will recommend again
customer_reviews.author: Toni Kolb

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds my expectations for projects around the house
customer_reviews.text: Would have preferred the trim saw or reciprocating saw instead of the router. Ended up buying them anyway which was probably a smart calculation on the part on the part of B+D to get more of my money. They can have it - the Matrix system is so well executed.
customer_reviews.author: Fornaio

customer_reviews.title: Great Toolage!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best advancement in toolage!! I used it immediately and found the attachments very much worth it. The only drawback was the router attachment did not have a router to use. I guess that detail was overlook...but 5/6 is a B-.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: its good, but they could have given the circular saw as an attachment instead..
customer_reviews.text: some duplicate attachments here, there is a oscillating sander , and a sander attachment for multitool, which bascially are the same. even size wise they are similar. so no real versatility there. Instead B&D should include a circular saw... cant comment on longetivity or battery life yet.
customer_reviews.author: Piyush Kamlakar

customer_reviews.title: Love it...most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set that offers variety for the occasional DIYer whose not looking to spend a small fortune in power tools. It's nice to be able to change attachments to suit the task I'm working on at the time. The case is nice, but will become obsolete once I buy more attachments. My biggest complaint is the battery charger. It's very flimsy and I feel like I need to be super careful. I will (eventually) buy a new charger, but we'll see how long this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Everything to get most jobs done around the house and on the job
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I can do anything i want around the house now and have the power to do it.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoeNamedBrad

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed, and exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, and exactly what I expected. I've used this brand for many years and I've never had a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Versatile to the max!
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Excellent choice of tools. Well suited to the handy homeowner that doesn't need the size, weight and expense of full size cordless tools.
customer_reviews.author: K. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to work on my boat and was a bit sceptical about the price and would all the functions work as well as buying the individually, but it has quickly become my go to kit for drilling, sanding and cutting. Just ordered two extra batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Landry

customer_reviews.title: fancy
customer_reviews.text: comes with one battery and one charger. great storage case. hopefully the lid will hold up its kind of thin. But ither than that its great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Cordless Drill Combo Kit with Case, 6-Tool (BDCDMT1206KITC)
product_meta.description: Style:Combo kitThe Black & Decker BDCDMT1206KITC Matrix 6 Tool Combo Kit is an all in one kit to tackle most jobs around the house. The 20-volt MAX Motor provides enough power for a full range of applications and attachments. The 20v MAX Lithium Ion Battery holds a charge up to 18 months so it is ready when you need it. The innovative Matrix Quick Connect System allows for quick and easy changing of all included attachments a Drill-Driver, Sander, Jig Saw, Oscillating, Router, and Impact driver attachments. The impact driver attachment delivers high performance output without kick back, along with a variable speed feature that allows for precision performance that is right for each job. The sanding attachment is a versatile product that can be used for finish sanding, rust removal, dry scrubbing, polishing, and detail sanding. The jig saw attachment is designed for tool-free blade changes for fast and easy change of blades, the router attachment delivers high speeds for fast trimming and decorative woodwork, and the oscillating attachment accepts a variety of Black + Decker accessories (sold separately) which can be used to cut drywall, metal, wood, plastic, composite and many other materials. Includes: (1) 20v Lithium Ion Power Unit, (1) BDCMTDD Drill/Driver Attachment, (1) Double-ended Bit, (1) BDCMTS Detail Sander Attachment, (6) Sheets of Sandpaper, (1) BDCMTJS Jigsaw Attachment, (1) Jigsaw Blade, (1) BDCMTO Oscillating Attachment, (1) Universal Adaptor, (1) Plunge Cut Blade, (1) Sanding Platen, (1) Sheet 60 Grit Sandpaper, (1) Sheet 240 Grit Sandpaper, (1) BDCMTI Impact Driver Attachment, (1) Router Attachment, (1) Screwdriving Bit, (1) 20V MAX Lithium Ion Battery, (1) 20V MAX Charger, (1) Storage Case
feature_bullets: Matrix Quick Connect system allows quick and easy change of a variety of attachments
Powerful 20V MAX motor for the performance needed to complete DIY activities
The lithium-ion battery is always ready and holds a charge of up to 18 months; Router Attachment: ideal for trimming, decorative woodwork and more
Kit includes drill, sander, jig saw, oscillating tool, router, and impact driver attachments
Jigsaw Attachment: designed for tool-free blade changes for fast and easy change of blades

Included Components: BDCDMT120 MATRIX 20V MAX* Power Unit, (1) BDCMTDD Drill/Driver Attachment, (1) Double-ended Bit, (1) BDCMTS Detail Sander Attachment, (6) Sheets of Sandpaper, (1) BDCMTJS Jigsaw Attachment, (1) Jigsaw Blade, (1) BDCMTO Oscillating Attachment, (1) Universal Adaptor, (1) Plunge Cut Blade, (1) Sanding Platen, (1) Sheet 60 Grit Sandpaper, (1) Sheet 240 Grit Sandpaper, (1) BDCMTI Impact Driver Attachment, (1) Router Attachment, (1) 20V MAX* Lithium Ion Battery, (1) 20V MAX* Charger, (1) Storage Case
